definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Detach a link from a chain.
sentences.chinese: 从链子上拆下一个链环。

sentences.english: Knot invariant is an important means to study polyhedral links.
sentences.chinese: 纽结不变量是研究多面体链环的主要工具。

sentences.english: It helps to transfer your power to the chain rings.
sentences.chinese: 它可以帮助你的权力转移到链环。

sentences.english: A lot of links fitted together form a chain.
sentences.chinese: 许多链环连在一起组成链条。

sentences.english: This research puts forward the definition of dual links and the methodology for the construction of dual links.
sentences.chinese: 这一研究提出了对偶链环的定义及其构建的方法。

sentences.english: By eliminating slack in nylon cord, grab link will disengage from lifting chain.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止尼龙绳松弛，要使抓钩链环脱离提升链条。

sentences.english: He detached a link from a chain .
sentences.chinese: 他从链子上拆下一个链环。

definition: to tangle up/to twist together/to wind
